sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>update user preferences glide.ui.menu.main.pinned.id for pinned menus</description>
        <name>Update Pinned Menu User Preference</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    var fixMap = {
        "all": "d6e462a5c3533010cbd77096e940dd8c",
        "workspaces": "63242b61c3133010cbd77096e940dd23",
        "favorites": "1b682fe1c3133010cbd77096e940dd18",
        "history": "c51543a5c3133010cbd77096e940dd43",
        "f15a7264c320011001dd7096e940dd37": "1b682fe1c3133010cbd77096e940dd18",
        "605a7264c320011001dd7096e940ddd2": "c51543a5c3133010cbd77096e940dd43",
        "535a3264c320011001dd7096e940ddae": "63242b61c3133010cbd77096e940dd23"
    };

    var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_user_preference");
    gr.addQuery("name", "glide.ui.menu.main.pinned.id");
    gr.query();

    while (gr.next()) {
        var key = gr.getValue("value");
        if (key !== null && fixMap[key] !== undefined) {
            gr.value = fixMap[key];
            gr.update();
        }
    }
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-02-11 07:27:22</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>a63230e65b210110fb2a210bb881c79e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update Pinned Menu User Preference</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Polaris Menu Provider" source="com.glide.polaris_menu_provider">b5bbf4a43c35311068bcf327dfe37f51</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">f20d4cf121160110a866589604c20d76</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a63230e65b210110fb2a210bb881c79e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-02-08 15:49:43</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
